GET_START.TITLE: Welcome to MoneyOwl!
GET_START.SUB_TITLE: In just a few steps, you will embark on a Comprehensive Financial Planning Journey with MoneyOwl. We’ll be taking you through your finances now and throughout your retirement years.

TELL_ABOUT_YOU.RETIREMENT_TITLE: How ready are you for retirement?
TELL_ABOUT_YOU.RETIREMENT_MAIN_TITLE: Tell us about you. You’ll see snapshots of your financial outlook right away...
TELL_ABOUT_YOU.RETIREMENT_MIN_TEXT: You can add up the amount of cash in all your bank accounts. The more detailed the amount, the more accurate is our recommendation.

LIFE_PAYOUT.PAGE_INFO: We have used our CPF Analyser and your Myinfo details to project your estimated payouts from CPF LIFE.
LIFE_PAYOUT.CARD_TITLE: Minimum CPF LIFE payout if you retire at age 55
LIFE_PAYOUT.DESC: Continue and know exactly the steps to take for greater financial confidence in attaining life and family goals, both now and in retirement.

DOWNLOAD_REPORT.DESC: Your financial outlook is ready  in this preview report!
DOWNLOAD_REPORT.TITLE: What’s Next?
DOWNLOAD_REPORT.MESSAGE: Take a look at your preview report for the Financial Outlook and Insights you need to know. Receive unbiased advices and actionable low-cost recommendations!

START_PLANNING.DESC: Great, you are all ready to start planning!
START_PLANNING.TITLE: Features and benefits to explore:
START_PLANNING.SUB_TXT1: Fully close your insurance gaps to protect the future of your loved ones.
START_PLANNING.SUB_TXT2: Invest your available cash for a comfortable retirement.
START_PLANNING.SUB_TXT3: Refine your report when you continue to update more details about you and your family.
START_PLANNING.SUB_TXT4: Contact us for a one-on-one advice should you need any customised planning.
